channel.title: Piano
channel.description:
I've just passed my grade 5 piano exam, not gonna lie, I'm super happy.
Are there any other musicians in the community?

item.title: Piano
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Good job. I passed my grade 3 exam with a distinction grade. Considering the time I have been playing the piano this is extremely bad (I’ve been playing since I was 7 but I haven’t had enough time to dedicate myself to it :() but I’m trying to get back to it. I might try my luck at grade 4 this year or the next one, depending on several factors.

Read full topic

item.title: Piano
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

I’m not sure if I should aim for Grade 8 piano before I graduate high school. I’m currently working on G6.

Read full topic

item.title: Piano
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:25, topic:429680”][quote author=chillwitm888 link=topic=532361.msg3890997#msg3890997 date=1326848031]
And second we don’t know him he just randomly comes outta nowhere and post this like we all care about pianos.
[/quote]
He is actually asking if anyone else is a musician, not knowing if we are in grade 5 or in collage.

A bit more on topic; I was forced to learn the basics of the “keyboard” (not knowing if it’s the actual name) in grade 4 or 5. It was hell, I couldn’t play shit and nearly failed the class because I hate piano’s.[/quote]he edited the post…

Read full topic

He is actually asking if anyone else is a musician, not knowing if we are in grade 5 or in collage.

item.title: Piano
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I personally like to play anything rock-oriented. I am just recently (past year or so) been getting into punk and grunge. Like the 90’s. Going to get together with some friends this weekend and play Tonight by Seether and Polyamorous by Breaking Benjamin.

Read full topic

item.title: Piano
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:18, topic:429680”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=532361.msg3891019#msg3891019 date=1326848822]
I would normally sing, but I instead started to learn piano in school this year. To be honest, I don’t like having to learn certain songs, I’d much rather pick my own and play them. I’ve actually been playing a bit from U.N. Owen Was Her to warm up every day and I never get tired of it
[/quote]
I try to learn the piano as i learn to sing, but their both pretty hard.[quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=532361.msg3891016#msg3891016 date=1326848692]

I’m a singer :o

Nice! I wish I could sing haha. What kind of stuff are you into?
[/quote]
Rock, and varietes of Pop[/quote]yeah, they’re not an easy thing to combine, you need to really know the keys on the piano and know the piano you’re playing to be able to multi-task.[quote=“runewings317, post:19, topic:429680”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=532361.msg3890996#msg3890996 date=1326848021]
brilliant trolling by those guys.

Jesus Christ! What the fuck is your peoples problem?!

OT: Good Job. I used to play piano… But since I got to a Christian school, my teacher tried to get me to play more Christian music and I got kinda tired of it… She did give me some classical pieces to do but I got bored… I was actually thinking about getting a keyboard and starting up again (since they have more sounds then a piano…).

Thanks runewings, you should take it back up. I have a digital standing keyboard but I don’t use it much, I got a baby grand piano for christmas so I’ve basically not stopped playing that in the waking hours I’m not at college or doing coursework haha. I love playing baroque/classical, Pachelbel’s canon has to be a favourite even though it’s grade 3.
[/quote]Meh… xD Not that into pianos, but I did play a little Mozart and Beethoven I think… I actually still have all my old books I think I even have my original one (like, when I first started in 1st grade original).[/quote]Awesome! I’ve still got all my old books, along with my guitar ones haha

rip4d:

And I can barely play the Can Can (which I’m learning right now)

Nice haha, I don’t even think I know that, I started with mary had a little lamb or something haha

Read full topic

item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

rip4d:

I would normally sing, but I instead started to learn piano in school this year. To be honest, I don’t like having to learn certain songs, I’d much rather pick my own and play them. I’ve actually been playing a bit from U.N. Owen Was Her to warm up every day and I never get tired of it

I try to learn the piano as i learn to sing, but their both pretty hard.[quote=“Ruby Forums Coder, post:14, topic:429680”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=532361.msg3891012#msg3891012 date=1326848545]

item.title: Piano
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

rip4d:

I would normally sing, but I instead started to learn piano in school this year. To be honest, I don’t like having to learn certain songs, I’d much rather pick my own and play them. I’ve actually been playing a bit from U.N. Owen Was Her to warm up every day and I never get tired of it

I was like that to begin with and then my tutor kinda got to grips with what I like to play and started giving me pieces to learn that I enjoyed playing. I usually play something extremely easy to warm up haha either; The Fray - Never Say Never or Pachelbel’s Canon. They’re both from very, very different times haha

Read full topic

krackkid:

To be honest if I did do something like this, I would of made a thread for everyone could pitch in…Not just talk about what I have done. or at least a video of him preforming?

I suppose.

I’ll edit it to make a discussion on musicians.
and I would post a video but I haven’t had any filmed performances yet, I’m only doing it as a second instrument to get to grade 8.

item.title: Piano
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“chillwitm888, post:8, topic:429680”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=532361.msg3890998#msg3890998 date=1326848060]

chill, and krack. I’ve lost respect for you, I thought you were chill, but I mean he’s happy for what he did, I’d be happy too if I was him.

I’m sure you’d be happy if you graduate college and got your PhD in physics and I just came and posted. “WHOOPDY FUCKING DOO. WHO GIVES A SHITTT”

You wouldn’t like it much :3

OT: Congrats

Thanks mate.
[/quote]
Take nothing offensively but i just don’t take 1st posters seriously[/quote]

a lot of people don’t if i’m being honest. I’ve only just came back to making RSPS websites and forums, I went away on other topics and other communities so I thought I’d join moparscape, I have to earn respect to be treated with it, it’s the cycle of big communities.

Read full topic
